titles.title: Taiwan Naval Support Act

To direct the President to submit to Congress a time frame for the transfer of certain naval vessels to Taiwan pursuant to section 102(b) of the Naval Vessel Transfer Act of 2013, and for other purposes.
Taiwan Naval Support Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Taiwan Naval Support Act
This bill directs the President to submit to Congress a time frame for the transfer of certain naval vessels to Taiwan.
